channel.title: Chris Warkentin
channel.description: Recent news about Chris Warkentin, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: OECD says Canada will lead G7 in economic growth for 2013. Starts Can says 59,200 new jobs created in Aug. Unemployment rate fell to 7.1%

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Celebrating the 1st anniversary of the #NationalBeeDiagnosticCentre in Beaverlodge. I'm proud of the success of BBDC! http://t.co/Mcr9MqXgxo

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Had a great opportunity to speak to the #BeaverlodgeChamberofCommerce this afternoon. Great to meet up with community leaders in Beaverlodge

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Great day for a drive out to Red Willow Gardens and then off to Beaverlodge.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: "@pmharper: Yet another sign we’re on the right track: Canada is now projected to lead the G7 in economic growth for 2013. #cdnpoli"

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: School is back today! Dropped Abigail off for her first day of Gr. 2. Best of luck to students + teachers on their return to the classroom.

item.title: Mentioned by HQ Grande Prairie
item.description:
